name: Soldier
description: War has been your life for as long as you care to remember. You are a veteran of a past conflict, and your experience has shaped you into a hardened combatant.

feature.name: Military Rank
feature.description: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence, and they defer to you if they are of a lower rank. You can invoke your rank to exert influence over other soldiers and requisition simple equipment or horses for temporary use.

traits.name: Skill Proficiencies
traits.description: You gain proficiency in the Athletics and Intimidation skills.

traits.name: Tool Proficiencies
traits.description: You gain proficiency with one type of gaming set and land vehicles.
